translation.en: [narrator] It begins like this.
translation.ja: 全ては20億年前―

translation.en: Two billion years ago, an amoeba.
translation.ja: １つのアメーバから始まった

translation.en: Wait, let's... Let's back up. I've skipped too many connections.
translation.ja: いや　もっと遡(さかのぼ)るとしよう

translation.en: Out of nothing, in an instant... everything.
translation.ja: “無”から突如として全てが生まれた

translation.en: An infinite cosmic orgy of matter and energy,
translation.ja: 宇宙のエネルギー物質の無限の力が

translation.en: rubbing, bumping, and grinding together.
translation.ja: こすれ合いぶつかり合った結果だ

translation.en: There would be no galaxies, no suns, no planets,
translation.ja: 巨大な天体の衝突がなければ

translation.en: no life without collisions of heavenly bodies.
translation.ja: 銀河も太陽も惑星も生まれなかった

translation.en: Back to our amoeba.
translation.ja: そしてアメーバがある細菌を飲み込むと―

translation.en: It engulfs a bacterium with unique powers, and... voilà...
translation.ja: そしてアメーバがある細菌を飲み込むと― 奇跡が生まれた

translation.en: Earth's first photosynthesis-enabled organism.
translation.ja: 光合成を行う有機体となったのだ

translation.en: Maybe it was chance. Maybe it was inevitable.
translation.ja: 偶然か はたまた必然か

translation.en: This one changed amoeba becomes the ancestor of every living plant on Earth,
translation.ja: こうして進化したアメーバがあらゆる命を生み出し

translation.en: which in turn floods the planet with oxygen...
translation.ja: 地球上は酸素であふれた

translation.en: paving the way for every other form of life we know, leading to more souls, more connections,
translation.ja: 様々な種が誕生し連鎖が次の連鎖を生んで

translation.en: and therefore more new worlds branching outward from the first.
translation.ja: 新しい世界が枝葉のように広がった

translation.en: These forces of nature, when they converge,
translation.ja: 自然の力が集中した時

translation.en: be they astronomical collisions, biological unions,
translation.ja: 天体の衝突も性の結合もそうだが

translation.en: demonstrate the infinite potential of our connections.
translation.ja: 結びつきの潜在力は無限に広がるのだ

translation.en: This truth also extends to the human heart.
translation.ja: この真理は人の心にも当てはまる

translation.en: Pack of Stuttons.
translation.ja: スタットン

translation.en: No offense, but how are you gonna pay for these?
translation.ja: カネはあるのか？

translation.en: I'm gonna use an ad Buddy to cover this purchase.
translation.ja: アド･バディで払うつもり

translation.en: Those assholes record client conversations.
translation.ja: この会話は聞かれてるぞ

translation.en: National Database of Desires.
translation.ja: 欲望管理局だよ

translation.en: The businessmen, ever hear of it? They know you better than you know you.
translation.ja: 君のことも調べ上げてる

translation.en: -Okay. -It's not a conspiracy, just a conspiracy theory.
translation.ja: まあ ただの陰謀論だけどな

translation.en: [narrator] Hypothesis: all souls are on a quest to connect.
translation.ja: 仮に 全人類がつながりを求めていたとして

translation.en: Corollary: our minds have no awareness of this quest.
translation.ja: 心はそのことに気付いていない

translation.en: Did you know that most quarters have been swallowed and defecated by a human?
translation.ja: 誰かが飲んでケツから出したかも

translation.en: [narrator] Hypothesis: all the worlds that almost were
translation.ja: 仮に― 生まれかけた全ての世界が

translation.en: matter just as much as the world we're in.
translation.ja: この世界のように困難なら？

translation.en: Corollary:
translation.ja: 当然―

translation.en: these hidden worlds cause us great pain.
translation.ja: それらの世界でも我々はひどく苦しむ

translation.en: No idea how I even really got to Poland in the first place.
translation.ja: よくポーランドにたどり着けたよ

translation.en: Bro, I'm telling you,
translation.ja: マジな話さ

translation.en: this was seriously such a crazy situation.
translation.ja: 財布も靴もなかったのに…

translation.en: Th... From Poland... I was in...
translation.ja: ポーランドからは

translation.en: I had no idea... I had no idea how I got there.
translation.ja: どうやって行ったのか…

translation.en: [narrator] Camaraderie, communion,
translation.ja: 友達との交流も

translation.en: family, friendship, love, what have you.
translation.ja: 家族とのつながりも―

translation.en: We're lost without connection.
translation.ja: 失えば 迷子になる

translation.en: [audio billboard] ...long-distance relationships are tough. Thank you, Friend Proxy.
translation.ja: “誰かと食べれば何でもおいしい”

translation.en: [narrator] It's quite terrible... to be alone.
translation.ja: １人ぼっちでいるのはつらすぎる

translation.en: Put simply, my goal is to eradicate all...
translation.ja: つまり私は根絶したいのだ

translation.en: unnecessary and inefficient forms of human pain.
translation.ja: 無意味で不要な人類の痛みを

translation.en: Forever.
translation.ja: 永遠に…

translation.en: We must evolve past our suffering.
translation.ja: 痛みから解放されるべきだ

translation.en: It's trash, not a handout. Let's move it.
translation.ja: それはゴミだ　どいて

translation.en: What are you, a cop?
translation.ja: 警官なの？

translation.en: Not much of a difference authority-wise. Let's go.
translation.ja: 大した違いはない　行け

translation.en: [narrator] My research into this matter is...
translation.ja: 〝ミルグリム･インダストリーズ〞 私はこの問題に取り組み研究を進めている 私はこの問題に取り組み研究を進めている

translation.en: of course, ongoing.
translation.ja: 私はこの問題に取り組み研究を進めている

translation.en: [man] The witness has already been sworn in.
translation.ja: 宣誓は済みましたね

translation.en: Mr. Milgrim, can you state for the court
translation.ja: ミルグリムさん ジェド被告との関係を述べてください

translation.en: your relationship with the defendant, Mr. Jed Milgrim?
translation.ja: ジェド被告との関係を述べてください

translation.en: He's, um...
translation.ja: 彼は―

translation.en: -He's my brother. -[man] Thank you.
translation.ja: 兄です あなたに逮捕歴は？

translation.en: Have you ever been arrested?
translation.ja: あなたに逮捕歴は？

translation.en: -No. -[man] Are you married?
translation.ja: いえ 結婚は？

translation.en: -No. -[man] Children?
translation.ja: いえ 子供は？

translation.en: No.
translation.ja: いえ

translation.en: [man] And can you tell us about the psychotic break
translation.ja: 10年ほど前にあなたが経験した―

translation.en: that you experienced roughly ten years ago?
translation.ja: 精神崩壊のことを聞かせて

translation.en: -Really? -[man] I'm just asking.
translation.ja: 本気？ できれば

translation.en: That's how they're gonna start? Dad, come on.
translation.ja: 本当に聞かれるの？　父さん

translation.en: It doesn't necessarily mean that it'll be like that in the trial, Owen,
translation.ja: 必ず聞かれるとは限らんよオーウェン

translation.en: but, uh, sometimes prosecutors, they...
translation.ja: だが時々 検察側は証言を崩すために―

translation.en: They try, uh, atypical inroads...
translation.ja: だが時々 検察側は証言を崩すために― 変なところから揺さぶりをかけてくる

translation.en: to crack you.
translation.ja: 変なところから揺さぶりをかけてくる

translation.en: That's why we, uh... We have to prep for the unexpected.
translation.ja: だから予想外の質問にも備えるんだ

translation.en: Can you resume, please?
translation.ja: 続けてくれ

translation.en: Have you ever been hospitalized for mental illness?
translation.ja: 精神を病んで入院したことは？

translation.en: Yes, ten years ago.
translation.ja: はい　10年前に

translation.en: Please explain what happened.
translation.ja: どんな体験でしたか？

translation.en: [Owen] I was hospitalized...
translation.ja: 入院させられた

translation.en: and medicated...
translation.ja: 薬を投与されて

translation.en: and...
translation.ja: それから…

translation.en: that was the last episode I had.
translation.ja: それ以外に話せることは何もありません

translation.en: Wasn't the nature of this psychosis delusional?
translation.ja: 幻覚を見るのですか？

translation.en: That you sometimes thought you saw your brother when he wasn't there?
translation.ja: 兄弟がいないのにいるように見える

translation.en: [Owen] Not exactly.
translation.ja: ちょっと違う

translation.en: Just say no.
translation.ja: “いえ”で結構

translation.en: Then what was the nature of this psychosis?
translation.ja: ではどういう状態ですか？

translation.en: [sighs] Owen, don't you think that your mental illness
translation.ja: 心の病を抱えた状態で―

translation.en: should disqualify you from testifying as a witness on your brother's behalf?
translation.ja: 証言台に立つのは難しいのでは？

translation.en: Look, there's only one question here that really matters.
translation.ja: 聞くべきことは１つだ

translation.en: Owen, do you know what is real?
translation.ja: オーウェン現実が何か分かるか？

translation.en: One hundred percent.
translation.ja: 分かるよ

translation.en: I'm compos mentis.
translation.ja: 僕は正気だからね

translation.en: [woman] Welcome to New York.
translation.ja: ＮＹへようこそ

translation.en: And this is Statue of Extra Liberty.
translation.ja: あちらに見えるのが“超自由の男神”です

translation.en: Statue of Extra Liberty. Okay.
translation.ja: “超自由の像” それでは次へ

translation.en: [man] How'd the trial prep go for a naughty brother?
translation.ja: 裁判の練習はどうだ？

translation.en: Did you tell 'em about me?
translation.ja: 俺の話はした？

translation.en: You're not supposed to be here.
translation.ja: なぜここに？

translation.en: [man] Good. You're still using the code words,
translation.ja: いいぞ　それが合言葉だ

translation.en: even though I am technically invisible.
translation.ja: 見えない俺にも使う

translation.en: Owen, this week must be a doozy for you, huh?
translation.ja: 今週はいろいろ大変だろうが

translation.en: You thought you were rid of me, but I have new information.
translation.ja: 俺は消えないぜ新しい情報がある

translation.en: This time I know.
translation.ja: 君は選ばれた

translation.en: You've been chosen to save the world.
translation.ja: 世界を救うんだよ

translation.en: You're gonna be a hero.
translation.ja: ヒーローになる

translation.en: I don't want this. I don't want it.
translation.ja: 別になりたくない

translation.en: I don't want this.
translation.ja: 僕は…

translation.en: The details of the mission will be delivered to you by an agent, a woman.
translation.ja: 女の諜報員が君に任務を伝える

translation.en: You'll know her when you see her, trust me.
translation.ja: 会えば分かる

translation.en: Just make contact with her. The pattern is the pattern.
translation.ja: 彼女に接触しろパターンはパターン

translation.en: She'll reach you for further instructions!
translation.ja: あとは彼女から聞け

translation.en: [yells] Don't fuck this up!
translation.ja: しくじるな！

translation.en: [automated voice] Welcome. Please make a selection to begin.
translation.ja: いらっしゃいませお選びください

translation.en: You selected single ride. How will you pay?
translation.ja: お１人様ですね支払い方法は？

translation.en: You selected credit.
translation.ja: クレジットを選択

translation.en: Please swipe now.
translation.ja: 機械にカードを

translation.en: Declined. Insufficient funds.
translation.ja: 支払いができません残高不足です

translation.en: Would you like to use an ad Buddy to add funds? Yes or no?
translation.ja: アド･バディでのお支払いを選択しますか？

translation.en: Welcome.
translation.ja: 〝ウンザリしたら旅へ出よう〞 いらっしゃいませ

translation.en: [Ad Buddy] Okay, Mr. Milgrim, I'm gonna need your attention.
translation.ja: ミルグリムさんよく聞いてください

translation.en: "When tragedy strikes others, it's sometimes hard to know what to do until now..."
translation.ja: “世の中にはパパを失った家族がいます”

translation.en: Owen.
translation.ja: “そこで―”

translation.en: "Daddy's Home. Consider becoming a temporary volunteer mail-order husband
translation.ja: “「パパの家」は夫を貸し出すことで”

translation.en: and changing the lives of a heartbroken family in your region."
translation.ja: “家族の人生を変えます” “家族の人生を変えます” 〝あなた〞

translation.en: Okay, well, up next,
translation.ja: それでは 次！

translation.en: we got something called Neberdine Pharmaceuticals.
translation.ja: ネバーディーンという製薬会社です

translation.en: "Good afternoon, Owen.
translation.ja: “こんにちは”

translation.en: Did you know that your rent comprises 87.2 percent of your annual income?"
translation.ja: “あなたの年収の87.2％が家賃で消えています”

translation.en: Is that actually true?
translation.ja: ホント？

translation.en: -I just moved into my own place. -[Ad Buddy] Manhattan these days...
translation.ja: 引っ越したばかりだ マンハッタンか

translation.en: I'm over in an underground warehouse unit. Hoboken.
translation.ja: 俺は地下倉庫に住んでるホーボーケンのね

translation.en: -I actually live in Roosevelt Island. -Okay, well...
translation.ja: ルーズベルト島だ あっそう

translation.en: Uh, let's see. Oh-ho-ho.
translation.ja: どうする？

translation.en: "A catastrophic interruption in your professional life,
translation.ja: 長く仕事に就かないでいると

translation.en: like a furlough, could ruin you.
translation.ja: 人生がダメになるよ

translation.en: Ever thought about supplementing your income with pharmaceutical testing?"
translation.ja: 被験者になって当座をしのげば？

translation.en: Friend Proxy.
translation.ja: “フレンド･プロキシ”

translation.en: "Tired of spending your time and energy making friends?"
translation.ja: 〝ネバーディーン製薬バイオテック〞 “友達作りに疲れたら…”

translation.en: [sales rep] And that is why Daddy's Home is happy to welcome you, Mr. Milgrim.
translation.ja: ぜひ“パパの家”で働いてください

translation.en: [Owen] And I'd have to cover relocation costs?
translation.ja: 引っ越し費用は自費？

translation.en: [sales rep] And inherit any potential debt of the deceased.
translation.ja: 故人の負債も背負います

translation.en: That doesn't make sense.
translation.ja: おかしいだろ

translation.en: [sales rep] So, that's a yes?
translation.ja: 答えは“イエス”？

translation.en: To what?
translation.ja: なぜ？

translation.en: [sales rep] It makes perfect sense. -We are offering you heroism. -[man] So this is your office area.
translation.ja: 引き受ければヒーローになれます

translation.en: [Owen] Your ad is misleading,
translation.ja: 広告と違うぞ

translation.en: 'cause you refer to it as a volunteer opportunity,
translation.ja: ボランティア活動でもあり―

translation.en: but in the end I'd have to pay.
translation.ja: 給与も出るとあった

translation.en: [sales rep] But think about what you'd be getting. -A wife, lonely, in need. -[Owen] Yeah.
translation.ja: 寂しくて飢えた妻が手に入るいい話でしょう？

translation.en: [man] Rozo did the anonymous hammerhead from the top down
translation.ja: 上から決定がくだった

translation.en: and came back with a 12-bullet short-termer.
translation.ja: 君に長期休暇を与える

translation.en: -When? -[man] Well, they randomized the pattern.
translation.ja: いつ？ 今朝すでに君に30通も連絡メールを送った

translation.en: We've sent out 30 memos on it since this morning.
translation.ja: 今朝すでに君に30通も連絡メールを送った

translation.en: Um, so this furlough, how long does it last?
translation.ja: その休暇はいつまでですか？

translation.en: -It's temporary. -[Owen] Right.
translation.ja: 一時的だよ

translation.en: So... when am I back?
translation.ja: それでいつ戻れるんですか？

translation.en: Oh, I don't know. I was kidding. It's probably permanent.
translation.ja: いや　多分 永遠に戻れない

translation.en: I was using your kind of humor,
translation.ja: 君のマネをしてみた

translation.en: when you say something you don't mean and nobody laughs.
translation.ja: 誰も笑わないジョークを言うだろ？

translation.en: It's... Yeah, it's okay. I'll just...
translation.ja: そうですか　じゃあ…

translation.en: I'll just dip into my savings.
translation.ja: 貯金で暮らします

translation.en: Bye.
translation.ja: じゃあな

translation.en: [man] Okay, Owen.
translation.ja: オーウェン　手順は分かる？

translation.en: -Do you know what I want to do? -[Owen] Yes.
translation.ja: オーウェン　手順は分かる？ はい

translation.en: [man] Are you sure you know what I want to do?
translation.ja: 本当に分かってる？

translation.en: [Owen] Yes.
translation.ja: はい

translation.en: [man] The way this deprogramming works, it's not an overnight fix.
translation.ja: この治療には時間がかかる

translation.en: You have to listen to it like a mantra.
translation.ja: マントラのように繰り返す

translation.en: If you start feeling paranoid, you play this tape right away, okay?
translation.ja: 妄想が始まったらこのテープを再生してくれ

translation.en: [Owen] Okay.
translation.ja: はい

translation.en: [man] Now, stop me when I say something that's not true.
translation.ja: 今から言うことが誤りなら止めて

translation.en: The world sends you messages.
translation.ja: 世界から声が届く

translation.en: [Owen] Yes.
translation.ja: はい

translation.en: [man] Words are often code words,
translation.ja: しばしば言葉が―

translation.en: or pass phrases for important secrets.
translation.ja: 秘密の合言葉になる 〝凍った物を選ぶ〞 秘密の合言葉になる 秘密の合言葉になる 〝選ばれし者らしく食え！〞

translation.en: [Owen] Yes.
translation.ja: 〝選ばれし者らしく食え！〞 はい 〝選ばれし者らしく食え！〞

translation.en: [man] You're visited by a brother no one else in your family is aware of.
translation.ja: 〝選ばれし者らしく食え！〞 君の家にジェドが来た 君の家にジェドが来た

translation.en: A facsimile of your brother Jed.
translation.ja: 家族が知らない間に

translation.en: -[Owen] Yes. -[man] He sends you messages.
translation.ja: はい 彼は君に大事な任務を伝えた

translation.en: Instructions for important missions you must accomplish.
translation.ja: 彼は君に大事な任務を伝えた

translation.en: [Owen] To see the deeper truth.
translation.ja: 真実を知れと…

translation.en: [man] He tells you you're meant to do something big, something that matters to the world,
translation.ja: 世界を変える大役を果たせと言われた

translation.en: and that you're not meant to do it alone.
translation.ja: ただし１人ではなく―

translation.en: All you need is a partner.
translation.ja: パートナーと２人で

translation.en: [Owen] Yes.
translation.ja: はい

translation.en: [audio billboard] You made a promise to me, and you made a promise to yourself.
translation.ja: 私と約束したわよね

translation.en: You promised we'd golf together in Hilton Head.
translation.ja: 一緒にゴルフをしましょう

translation.en: [man] You sense danger all around you, but you stay disciplined.
translation.ja: 君は危険を感じても取り乱さない

translation.en: A fight's coming. Something even bigger than this world.
translation.ja: 戦いが始まるこの世界より大きく―

translation.en: Possibly extending to multiple galaxies.
translation.ja: いくつもの銀河系につながる

translation.en: -[elevator] Fourth floor. Thank you. -[Owen] Yes.
translation.ja: はい

translation.en: Hello, Mrs. Finkelstein.
translation.ja: こんばんは

translation.en: Fuck off, Donovan.
translation.ja: どきな　ドノヴァン

translation.en: It's, uh, Owen.
translation.ja: 僕はオーウェン･ミルグリムです

translation.en: -Owen Milgrim... -[Finkelstein] Fuck off, Donovan.
translation.ja: 僕はオーウェン･ミルグリムです 消えな　ドノヴァン

translation.en: Never mind.
translation.ja: 失礼しました

translation.en: Good.
translation.ja: よろしい

translation.en: Does it feel good to be heard?
translation.ja: 聞かれてうれしい？

translation.en: [Owen] Yes.
translation.ja: はい

translation.en: [man] Does it feel good to know that you're not alone with this information?
translation.ja: このことを知る人が他にもいて安心？

translation.en: [Owen] Yeah.
translation.ja: はい

translation.en: [man] Will you complete your mission?
translation.ja: 任務は遂行する？

translation.en: [Owen] Maybe.
translation.ja: たぶん

translation.en: [man] Am I a trusted messenger?
translation.ja: 私は信用できる？

translation.en: [Owen] Yes.
translation.ja: はい はい 「直さずただ喜びなさい」 「直さずただ喜びなさい」

translation.en: [man] Good. Then here are your real instructions.
translation.ja: 「直さずただ喜びなさい」 では指示を出すとしよう

translation.en: Repeat after me.
translation.ja: 繰り返して

translation.en: There is no pattern.
translation.ja: パターンはない

translation.en: [Owen] There is no pattern.
translation.ja: パターンはない

translation.en: [man] I am vulnerable, but I am not stupid.
translation.ja: 私は弱いがバカではない

translation.en: [Owen] I'm vulnerable, but I'm not stupid.
translation.ja: 弱いがバカじゃない

translation.en: But I will seek out the people in my life that care about me.
translation.ja: 気にかけてくれる人を見つける

translation.en: [Owen] I will seek out the people in my life who care about me.
translation.ja: 気にかけてくれる人を見つける

translation.en: I am not the chosen one.
translation.ja: 僕は特別じゃない

translation.en: [Owen] I am not the chosen one.
translation.ja: 特別じゃない

translation.en: -The voices aren't real. -[clattering]
translation.ja: 声は現実じゃない

translation.en: -[Owen] The voices aren't real. -The voices aren't real.
translation.ja: 声は現実じゃない

translation.en: The voices are just noise.
translation.ja: 声はただの騒音

translation.en: -[Owen] The voices are just noise. -The voices are just noise.
translation.ja: 声はただの騒音

translation.en: I am just a guy with a vivid imagination.
translation.ja: 僕は想像力が豊かなだけだ

translation.en: [Owen] I'm just a guy with a vivid imagination.
translation.ja: 想像力が豊かなだけだ

translation.en: I will most likely not be the savior of our galaxy.
translation.ja: 僕は銀河系の救世主とはほど遠い

translation.en: Hello?
translation.ja: どなた？

translation.en: [man, distorted] I've got a package from Neberdine Pharmaceutical Biotech
translation.ja: ネバーディーン製薬バイオテックから

translation.en: for an Owen Milgrim.
translation.ja: お届け物です

translation.en: What?
translation.ja: 何て？

translation.en: [man] I've got a package. Your name.
translation.ja: あなた宛ての封書が

translation.en: Hello?
translation.ja: はい

translation.en: [woman] Hi, Owen. Did you get what I sent you?
translation.ja: 資料は届きましたか？

translation.en: [Owen] How did you...?
translation.ja: なぜ…

translation.en: [woman] I've just been informed that you qualify as a hero candidate.
translation.ja: あなたはヒーローに選ばれました

translation.en: -What does that mean? -[woman] It's a term we use
translation.ja: どういう… 被験者に選ばれた方をそう呼んでいます

translation.en: for those who've been specifically selected for one of our studies.
translation.ja: 被験者に選ばれた方をそう呼んでいます

translation.en: You're a very desirable individual to us, Owen.
translation.ja: あなたは理想の被験者です

translation.en: I've never seen B.N. over-ratios like this before.
translation.ja: 初めて見る高いＢＮ比です

translation.en: What does a hero candidate do?
translation.ja: 何をすれば？

translation.en: [woman] Exactly the things they were born to.
translation.ja: あなたしかできないこと

translation.en: In your case, helping us treat maladies
translation.ja: 病の治療に役立ちます

translation.en: ranging from sluggishness and depression,
translation.ja: 無気力やうつ病

translation.en: to I.B.S, to popcorn problems and irrational fears.
translation.ja: ポップコーン問題や理由のない不安感

translation.en: "Popcorn problems"?
translation.ja: ポップコーン？

translation.en: [woman] Prostate problems, yes.
translation.ja: 前立腺の病です

translation.en: Oh, I thought you...
translation.ja: それは…

translation.en: [woman] We'll give you all the details when you come in.
translation.ja: 詳しくは いらした時に

translation.en: So, we'll see you on Monday?
translation.ja: 月曜はいかが？

translation.en: ♪ Someday you're gonna feel lonely ♪
translation.ja: いつか あなたは寂しくなり

translation.en: ♪ Someday you're gonna feel blue ♪
translation.ja: ブルーな気分になるだろう

translation.en: ♪ Someday you'll long for me only ♪
translation.ja: 僕だけを恋焦がれる

translation.en: Good evening, Mr. Milgrim.
translation.ja: こんばんは

translation.en: Everyone is on the patio for the recital.
translation.ja: 皆さまパティオに

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.ja: ありがとう

translation.en: ♪ Someday you're gonna feel weary ♪
translation.ja: いつか あなたは疲れ切り

translation.en: ♪ You'll grieve when I'm far away ♪
translation.ja: 遠くにいる僕を思い深く悲しむ

translation.en: ♪ Then you'll be missin' My huggin' and my kissin' ♪
translation.ja: 僕のハグやキスが恋しくなる

translation.en: ♪ You'll remember what I say ♪
translation.ja: 僕の言葉を思い出す

translation.en: ♪ You'll never know The good fellow I've been ♪
translation.ja: いい男だと気付いたのは

translation.en: -♪ Until I've gone away ♪ -♪ Till I've gone away ♪ ♪ Gone away ♪
translation.ja: 僕が去った後だった

translation.en: ♪ You're bound to miss The little things that I did ♪
translation.ja: 僕のささいな思い出も恋しくなる

translation.en: -♪ I did ♪ -♪ For you each day ♪
translation.ja: 毎日君にしてきたこと

translation.en: -♪ You're gonna yearn ♪ -♪ You will be yearning ♪
translation.ja: きっと君は思うだろう

translation.en: -♪ For my returning ♪ -♪ For my returning ♪
translation.ja: 僕に戻って欲しいと

translation.en: -♪ You're bound to miss me ♪ -♪ You're bound to miss me ♪
translation.ja: 会いたくなるのさ

translation.en: -♪ You'll long to kiss me ♪ -♪ You'll long to kiss me ♪
translation.ja: キスしたくなるのさ

translation.en: ♪ You'll never know The good fellow I've been ♪
translation.ja: いい男だと気付いたのは

translation.en: -♪ Until I've gone away ♪ -♪ Until I've gone away ♪
translation.ja: いい男だと気付いたのは 僕が去った後だった

translation.en: ♪ Till I've gone away ♪
translation.ja: 僕が去った後だった

translation.en: Where does she sleep when she stays over?
translation.ja: この子はどこで寝るの？

translation.en: [Belle] This one?
translation.ja: この子？

translation.en: Yeah, she's your sister, right?
translation.ja: 君の妹なんだろ？

translation.en: Or is she a secret agent?
translation.ja: それとも彼女は諜報員かな？

translation.en: How did you know?
translation.ja: なぜ知ってるの？

translation.en: [whispering] Because I have super-secret sources
translation.ja: 実は超秘密の情報を調べる―

translation.en: at a super-secret agency.
translation.ja: 諜報機関を持ってるんだ

translation.en: Don't tell anyone.
translation.ja: 内緒だよ

translation.en: [whispers] Okay.
translation.ja: 分かった

translation.en: Supper's ready.
translation.ja: 夕食よ

translation.en: Okay, Mom.
translation.ja: 今行く

translation.en: I was completely baffled.
translation.ja: マジで驚いたぜ

translation.en: You know, I left for school.
translation.ja: 学校に行く前は

translation.en: Ernie was fine, and then, you know, the food was in the bowl.
translation.ja: アーニーは元気だったしエサもあった

translation.en: The water was there, cage was locked up,
translation.ja: ケージも閉じていた

translation.en: and I get back from basketball practice,
translation.ja: なのにバスケして帰ったら消えてたんだ

translation.en: -and he's just gone, absolutely... -The great gerbil escape artist.
translation.ja: なのにバスケして帰ったら消えてたんだ スナネズミの大脱走

translation.en: -But he wasn't exactly fucking gone. -Language, Phil.
translation.ja: クソみたいな話さ

translation.en: No, that's correct. He wasn't exactly fucking gone like that.
translation.ja: たしかにクソみてえな話だ

translation.en: -[Angelica] Language, Jed. -Where'd he go, O?
translation.ja: 話せ　オーウェン

translation.en: Maybe you shouldn't curse so much in front of the children.
translation.ja: “クソ”はやめてよ どうでもいい

translation.en: -Ah, come on. Tell the rest. -[Angelica] This is not a farmyard, boys.
translation.ja: どうでもいい みんな騒ぐな

translation.en: So, um, I ask everyone, right? Everyone's looking around the whole house, everyone frantic,
translation.ja: それでネズミの行方を家族に聞いて回った

translation.en: and finally Owen, you know, eventually comes up and brings me to his room...
translation.ja: 最後にオーウェンの部屋に呼ばれて行った

translation.en: How old were you then, Owen? Like, eight or somethin'?
translation.ja: お前 ８歳だった？

translation.en: -Nine. -[Jed] Eight or nine, whatever.
translation.ja: ９歳 その時の会話がこうだ

translation.en: And he says-- He says,
translation.ja: その時の会話がこうだ

translation.en: "Uh, I have to tell you somethin'. My-- My hawk ate Ernie."
translation.ja: “僕のタカがアーニーを食べたみたい”

translation.en: "What?" And he points over there,
translation.ja: “何だと？” 指を差した方を見るとでかいタカがこっちを見てた

translation.en: and there's this big fuckin' red-tailed hawk sitting on his desk staring at me.
translation.ja: 指を差した方を見るとでかいタカがこっちを見てた

translation.en: What eight-year-old has a fuckin' hawk?
translation.ja: ８歳の坊主がタカを飼う？

translation.en: Uh, how did you have a hawk?
translation.ja: どうしてタカが？

translation.en: Um, I rescued it from the park.
translation.ja: 公園で見つけたんだ

translation.en: I found it with a broken wing and brought it to my room and fed it.
translation.ja: 羽が折れていたから保護した

translation.en: [Jed] Yeah, I forgot. That...
translation.ja: 思い出したぜ

translation.en: That was the craziest part. He would feed it, like a mother bird, you know...
translation.ja: オーウェンは鳥の親みたいに口からエサを

translation.en: Oh, masticate-- No, no, no. Premasticate.
translation.ja: やめてよ　ドロドロじゃない

translation.en: -Yeah, premastication! -[man] Jed was a chronic masticater.
translation.ja: 咀嚼(そしゃく)魔さ それはジェドだ

translation.en: -[Jed] How'd you know? -[man] You can go blind doing that.
translation.ja: なぜ知ってる？

translation.en: How long did you take care of the bird for, Owen?
translation.ja: どのぐらい飼ってたの？

translation.en: Two or three months, until it was strong enough
translation.ja: ３カ月かな　元気になって―

translation.en: to go into Jed's room and eat his gerbil, I guess.
translation.ja: ジェドのネズミを食えるようになるまで

translation.en: But what happened to the hawk?
translation.ja: タカはどうなったの？

translation.en: We set it free.
translation.ja: 放したんだ

translation.en: Oh. Okay.
translation.ja: なんだ　そっか

translation.en: [Porter] That reminds me. Remember when Colby fell in the Gowanus Canal?
translation.ja: コルビーは運河に落ちたことがあったな

translation.en: -Remember that day? -[Angelica] Oh, poor Colby.
translation.ja: 覚えてるか？

translation.en: [Porter] I threw the stick, -he didn't go for it... -[Angelica] So traumatizing.
translation.ja: 私が棒を投げたのにコルビーは…

translation.en: [Adelaide] I told Jed I wouldn't marry him until they painted you in.
translation.ja: ジェドにはあなたを描き込むまで

translation.en: Maybe that's why we haven't set a date yet.
translation.ja: 結婚しないと言ったの

translation.en: They're gonna paint me in.
translation.ja: いずれ描くよ

translation.en: The artist just took a six-month sabbatical to Nepal, to study the light.
translation.ja: 画家が半年休んでネパールに勉強に行ってる

translation.en: I lost my job.
translation.ja: またクビだよ

translation.en: I'm sorry, Owen.
translation.ja: それは残念だわ

translation.en: It's okay, I'll find a new one.
translation.ja: 次を探せばいい

translation.en: I'm actually thinking about becoming... a temporary volunteer husband.
translation.ja: ボランティアで誰かの夫になろうかな

translation.en: You're not serious.
translation.ja: 冗談？

translation.en: Get rid of my lease, bounce from widow to widow.
translation.ja: 未亡人をハシゴするんだ

translation.en: Do you ever notice that your plans always involve starting over...
translation.ja: 気付いてる？あなたはいつも― 別人になってやり直すような話をしてるわ

translation.en: often with an entirely new identity?
translation.ja: 別人になってやり直すような話をしてるわ

translation.en: It's a good fantasy.
translation.ja: 夢があるだろ

translation.en: [Angelica] Pudding's upstairs by the fireplace, everyone.
translation.ja: 暖炉の前にプディングを用意したわよ

translation.en: Just to get through the post-dinner conversation.
translation.ja: 団らんに戻りましょう

translation.en: Think about it.
translation.ja: 考えてみて

translation.en: Seriously...
translation.ja: 真剣にさ

translation.en: as a hypothetical.
translation.ja: 仮にだよ

translation.en: Say you and I left, right? Tonight.
translation.ja: 今夜 僕と２人で家を抜け出すとする

translation.en: I got us passports, new identities.
translation.ja: 僕は別人のパスポートを２つ用意して

translation.en: You steal all the money from Jed's bank account.
translation.ja: 君はジェドのカネを全部 盗む

translation.en: We just... do that. We get a house in the middle of nowhere.
translation.ja: そして２人でどこか遠くに家を持つんだ

translation.en: Start again.
translation.ja: やり直す

translation.en: Different people.
translation.ja: 別人として

translation.en: Are we a married couple?
translation.ja: 夫婦になるの？

translation.en: We don't...
translation.ja: いや

translation.en: We can be, you know...
translation.ja: でも　ほら

translation.en: We don't have to be. We could be brother, or sister, or... friends.
translation.ja: きょうだいとか友達になればいいさ

translation.en: So...
translation.ja: じゃあ―

translation.en: tonight, then, after dessert?
translation.ja: 今夜デザートを食べた後に？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.ja: うん

translation.en: I'm serious. Let's do it.
translation.ja: 本気だ　やろう

translation.en: You're fucking with me.
translation.ja: からかってる

translation.en: I got you.
translation.ja: 驚いた？

translation.en: You believed me.
translation.ja: 信じたろ？

translation.en: This week's gonna be a living hell for me.
translation.ja: 今週は生き地獄になるわ

translation.en: He'll totally win.
translation.ja: ジェドが勝つさ

translation.en: He's not guilty. No chance of a conviction.
translation.ja: 無実だ　有罪にはならない

translation.en: It's all just so humiliating.
translation.ja: でもひどい屈辱だわ

translation.en: I mean, it's been going on for fucking ages,
translation.ja: 今まで本当に長かった

translation.en: all just for one day in court.
translation.ja: 裁判はたった１日なのに

translation.en: Because he didn't do it, so...
translation.ja: ジェドはやってない

translation.en: You're positive?
translation.ja: 本当にそう？

translation.en: Right? You were actually with him?
translation.ja: 本当に一緒にいた？

translation.en: Yes.
translation.ja: いたよ

translation.en: [Phil] You would make that move. -[man 1] What does that even mean? -[Phil] You would make that move.
translation.ja: お前はやるしかないんだよ

translation.en: [man 2] That's the move--
translation.ja: 何を？

translation.en: Hey, Owen, you're not trying to sneak off, are you?
translation.ja: オーウェン　帰るなよ

translation.en: No, Dad.
translation.ja: まさか

translation.en: I need a second of your time before you leave.
translation.ja: もう少しここにいろ

translation.en: Come on, boys, it's time.
translation.ja: さあ みんな　始めるわよ

translation.en: [all] Balderdash!
translation.ja: ブラフゲームだ

translation.en: -[Angelica] Owen, you're staying to play. -No, I-- I have to go.
translation.ja: オーウェンも 僕は帰らなきゃ

translation.en: -I have something... -[Angelica] You love Balderdash.
translation.ja: あなた好きでしょ？

translation.en: No, I don't.
translation.ja: 別に

translation.en: Come on, stay, it will be fun.
translation.ja: 一緒に遊びましょうよ

translation.en: I have a fundamental problem with Balderdash.
translation.ja: できない 今夜の食事は本当にうまかった

translation.en: I gotta say, what a delicious meal that was.
translation.ja: 今夜の食事は本当にうまかった

translation.en: So good, Mom. So good.
translation.ja: 母さん万歳！

translation.en: -You used to love Balderdash. -Mom, no, I didn't.
translation.ja: 好きだったわ 嫌いだ

translation.en: -[Jed] Who wants ice cream? -[children yelling]
translation.ja: アイスは？ 欲しい

translation.en: -Who wants ice cream? Oh, you do? -I do!
translation.ja: アイスクリーム欲しい子は？

translation.en: Of course. But whoever's the quietest gets ice cream, I promise. Mom.
translation.ja: 一番 静かにできた子にあげよう

translation.en: Oh, are we playing Balderdash, or what?
translation.ja: いいねブラフゲームをやるのか？

translation.en: So, um... [clears throat] I've been considering...
translation.ja: 考えたんだけど…

translation.en: Considering leaving Roosevelt Island? -No... -[Angelica] Oh, thank God.
translation.ja: ルーズベルト島を出る？やめてよ

translation.en: So, have Hal help you find something closer.
translation.ja: 近くに引っ越してきなさい

translation.en: -Oh, you moving closer? -[Owen] I'm not moving closer.
translation.ja: 近くに？ いいや

translation.en: Crazy to think that every word did get invented.
translation.ja: 言葉を発明した奴はすげーな

translation.en: I-- I have to go. Goodbye.
translation.ja: 帰るよ　じゃあね

translation.en: -Wait, you're not playing Balderdash? -No, I can't. Bye.
translation.ja: ゲームは？ やらないよ

translation.en: Oh, Owen, come on, you love Balderdash.
translation.ja: お前が好きなゲームだ

translation.en: No, I don't fucking love Balderdash! Balderdash is bullshit. [clears throat]
translation.ja: 好きなもんか！ クソみたいな遊びだ

translation.en: -Jesus, Owen. -Is he off his meds?
translation.ja: どうしたんだ 薬が切れた？

translation.en: -[Belle cries] -I'll walk you to the station.
translation.ja: 駅まで歩こう

translation.en: -[Phil] Don't worry about Uncle Owen. -Aggressive.
translation.ja: 心配しなくていい

translation.en: [Phil] He's a spaz. We're gonna get ice cream now.
translation.ja: おじさんは病気なんだ

translation.en: -[Porter] Is it a money crisis? -[Owen] No.
translation.ja: 金欠か？ 違う

translation.en: I know it's an expensive apartment to rent, but...
translation.ja: たしかにあそこの家賃は高いが…

translation.en: Have you...? Have you thought about a...? A roommate?
translation.ja: ルームメイトを探したらどうだ

translation.en: No.
translation.ja: いや

translation.en: I don't know why you won't let us just buy you a place.
translation.ja: 私たちに家を買わせてくれたら

translation.en: That way you'd have more security.
translation.ja: 安心なんだがな

translation.en: Or you... You could come and work for the company.
translation.ja: うちの会社で働くのはどうだ？

translation.en: All your brothers do.
translation.ja: 兄弟みたいに

translation.en: I already agreed, okay?
translation.ja: 引き受けただろ

translation.en: You don't need to buy me off.
translation.ja: 買収しなくていい

translation.en: Uh... I don't... I don't follow you. What--?
translation.ja: どういう意味だ？

translation.en: I will lie for Jed...
translation.ja: ウソの証言をする

translation.en: next week in court.
translation.ja: 来週 裁判所で―

translation.en: I get the expectation.
translation.ja: 期待に応えるよ

translation.en: It's not an expectation, Owen, it's a gift.
translation.ja: これは期待じゃないプレゼントだ

translation.en: You are giving your brother the gift of an alibi.
translation.ja: アリバイをプレゼントするだけだ

translation.en: This woman is an opportunist. She sees an in.
translation.ja: 相手の女はどうせカネ目当てだ

translation.en: [sighs] You're protecting him. -You're protecting the family. -Right.
translation.ja: 兄貴を守るんだよ家族のためだ

translation.en: I know, I know, it sounds muddled, but that is the way reality works, Owen.
translation.ja: 混乱するかもしれんが現実とはそういうもんだ

translation.en: -How's that, Dad? -[poop bot chatters]
translation.ja: どこが？

translation.en: With... With adjustments.
translation.ja: ズレを調整するんだ

translation.en: Just so you know, I got a new job.
translation.ja: 新しい仕事が見つかった

translation.en: Oh? What...? What job?
translation.ja: 本当か？　どんな仕事だ

translation.en: Business... marketing.
translation.ja: 販売事業だよ

translation.en: It involves travel, so I'll be gone a couple days next week,
translation.ja: 来週２日ほど出張があるけど

translation.en: but I'll be back in time for the trial.
translation.ja: 裁判までには戻る

translation.en: And...
translation.ja: その間―

translation.en: don't worry if you can't reach me.
translation.ja: 音信不通になる

translation.en: Someone invented a new kind of ham.
translation.ja: ハムの新商品なんだ

translation.en: That's... That's wonderful, Owen. That's-- That's-- That's great.
translation.ja: よかったじゃないかオーウェン　すごいぞ

translation.en: Milgrim men, we always come out on top.
translation.ja: ミルグリムの男は常にトップだ

translation.en: Anyway...
translation.ja: 頑張れ

translation.en: -All right. -[poop bot chatters]
translation.ja: 分かった 〝清掃車〞

translation.en: -[dog whimpers] -[Porter] Hey, Colby, it's a Tristan 500.
translation.ja: 〝清掃車〞 おいこら　コルビー 〝清掃車〞

translation.en: -[poop bot] Cleaning in progress. -[Porter] No kicking and licking.
translation.ja: 〝清掃車〞 舐めたらダメだぞ

translation.en: [woman over PA] Find the end of your rainbow
translation.ja: 我が社であなたの虹の―

translation.en: at Neberdine Pharmaceutical and Biotech.
translation.ja: 終わりを見つけてください

translation.en: Psst, buddy. Which one are you here for?
translation.ja: おい　あんたはどの試験？

translation.en: It should be on the form right there.
translation.ja: 紙を見りゃ分かる

translation.en: It says, uh, U.L.P.
translation.ja: “ＵＬＰ”と書いてある

translation.en: Me too.
translation.ja: 俺もだ

translation.en: That's a good one.
translation.ja: いいやつだ

translation.en: It's the big time.
translation.ja: カネがいい

translation.en: Get ready to make a lot of fuckin' money.
translation.ja: たんまり稼げるぜ

translation.en: [woman over PA] Carol Cuddy. Carol Cuddy, please report to D.M. test room three
translation.ja: キャロル･カディーさんＤＭ試験室で

translation.en: for A.E.B Phase I.
translation.ja: 適正検査を… 適正検査を… 〝ＵＬＰ試験フェーズ３〞

translation.en: What do the bombs mean?
translation.ja: この爆弾の絵は？

translation.en: High-risk. That's where the dollars come from.
translation.ja: ハイリスクなんだだから金額も高い

translation.en: Apparently, they're havin' some kind of problem with this new drug.
translation.ja: きっと新薬で問題が起きたんだろ

translation.en: -I think you should let me do it again. -Strong stuff. Very trippy shit.
translation.ja: 強くてトリップするようなやつだ

translation.en: -[woman] Who's in charge of the red light? -That doesn't bother you?
translation.ja: 心配じゃない？

translation.en: -No. -I don't fucking understand. -No risk, no reward. -I'm supposed to be part of the trial.
translation.ja: ノーリスクノーリターンだからな

translation.en: -I'm sorry. -This is fucking bullshit.
translation.ja: こんなのデタラメだわ

translation.en: [woman over PA] Jon Mallard, please report to D.M. test room one.
translation.ja: ジョン･マロリーさん

translation.en: Jon Mallard, please report to D.M. test room one for Rumi Phase III.
translation.ja: ＤＭ試験室１番へどうぞ 適正検査があります

translation.en: [woman] Patricia. Patricia.
translation.ja: ねえ　パトリシア！

translation.en: [woman over PA] Owen Milgrim, please report to D.M. test room five.
translation.ja: オーウェン･ミルグリムさん

translation.en: Owen Milgrim, please report to D.M. test room five for U.L.P. screening.
translation.ja: ＤＭ試験室５番へどうぞ ＵＬＰ適正検査です

translation.en: Steven McDougal, please report to test room eight.
translation.ja: スティーブン･マクドゥーガルさん

translation.en: Steven McDougal, please report to test room eight for M.S. One Phase II.
translation.ja: 試験室８番でＭＳ１フェーズ２の適正検査を…

translation.en: [Owen] Unnecessary.
translation.ja: “不必要”

translation.en: [woman] Try to answer with an emotion, rather than a description.
translation.ja: 説明ではなく感じたことを答えて

translation.en: Uh... calm.
translation.ja: “穏やか”

translation.en: [Owen] Justice.
translation.ja: “正義”

translation.en: -Is this personalized somehow? -[woman] No.
translation.ja: 僕に特化したテスト？ いいえ　問題に集中して

translation.en: Focus on your answers.
translation.ja: いいえ　問題に集中して

translation.en: -Suffocated. -[woman] Good.
translation.ja: “息苦しい”

translation.en: Now, Mr. Milgrim...
translation.ja: ミルグリムさん

translation.en: please turn your attention to me
translation.ja: 私の目を見て―

translation.en: as I ask you this final question.
translation.ja: 最後の質問に答えて

translation.en: Are you gonna ask it?
translation.ja: 質問はまだ？

translation.en: -Does that disqualify me? -[machine beeps]
translation.ja: まさか今ので失格？

translation.en: Your defense mechanisms are fungible.
translation.ja: 防衛機能は代替可能ですね

translation.en: You've been accepted.
translation.ja: 合格です

translation.en: [woman over PA] Find the end of your rainbow
translation.ja: 我が社であなたの虹の―

translation.en: at Neberdine Pharmaceutical and Biotech.
translation.ja: 終わりを見つけてください

translation.en: Stop looking at me.
translation.ja: 見ないでよ

translation.en: Did...? Did you...?
translation.ja: もしかして君は…

translation.en: Did you lose your husband recently?
translation.ja: 夫を亡くした？

translation.en: Did you lose your husband recently?
translation.ja: 最近 未亡人になった？

translation.en: No.
translation.ja: いいえ

translation.en: -[Owen] But I just saw... -Leave me alone.
translation.ja: でも… 黙って

translation.en: Do you play golf in Hilton Head?
translation.ja: ゴルフはしてる？

translation.en: I'll kill you.
translation.ja: 殺すわよ

translation.en: I have a gun.
translation.ja: 銃がある

translation.en: [Patricia over PA] Attention, please, all participants in the U.L.P. Phase III trial, please look at your lanyards.
translation.ja: ＵＬＰフェーズ３の被験者はカードをご確認ください

translation.en: If you are an odd number, please line up at the intake corridor.
translation.ja: 奇数の方は― 合格者用の廊下に並んでください

translation.en: All even numbers will be next.
translation.ja: 偶数の方はお待ちを

translation.en: It's Jed.
translation.ja: ジェドだ

translation.en: No, it's Grimsson.
translation.ja: グリムソンだよ

translation.en: Mustache. No, don't say anything. Just be cool.
translation.ja: ヒゲをつけた　騒ぐなよ

translation.en: The pattern is the pattern.
translation.ja: パターンがお前を

translation.en: The pattern got you here.
translation.ja: ここに導いた

translation.en: Keep trusting the pattern.
translation.ja: パターンを信じろ

translation.en: She's your handler now.
translation.ja: 彼女が例の女だ

translation.en: She has a certain je ne sais quoi. She's no Olivia, though.
translation.ja: 上質ないい女だろ？オリヴィアじゃないけどな

translation.en: Make contact with her. Use the code phrase.
translation.ja: 合言葉で接触しろ

translation.en: [Patricia over PA] If you are an odd number,
translation.ja: 奇数の方は―

translation.en: please line up at the intake corridor.
translation.ja: 廊下にお並びください

translation.en: The pattern is the pattern. I know it doesn't make sense.
translation.ja: パターンが何のことか俺にも分からんが

translation.en: It doesn't make sense to me either right now, but it will.
translation.ja: パターンが何のことか俺にも分からんが いずれ分かる

translation.en: Keep going forward.
translation.ja: とにかく前に進め

translation.en: Just reach out...
translation.ja: 接触するんだ

translation.en: and make contact.
translation.ja: 彼女にな

translation.en: [Patricia over PA] All odd numbers, line up by the intake corridor.
translation.ja: 奇数の方は廊下に並んでください

translation.en: What the fuck is wrong with you?
translation.ja: ちょっと何なの？

translation.en: Sorry.
translation.ja: ごめん

translation.en: Robert.
translation.ja: ロバート

translation.en: Robert.
translation.ja: ロバート

translation.en: Robert, wake up.
translation.ja: 起きて

translation.en: The odds are here.
translation.ja: 奇数の人たちよ

translation.en: Okay.
translation.ja: そうか

translation.en: Let us complete this trial with none of the old problems, sir.
translation.ja: 今度は最後まで成功させましょう

translation.en: Yes, Dr. Fujita. None of the old problems.
translation.ja: もちろんだ　フジタくん同じ過ちは繰り返さん

translation.en: [orderly] As you enter the common room, you will notice there are numbers on the pods.
translation.ja: コモンルームには個別のポッドがあります

translation.en: The pod numbers correspond with the numbers on your lanyards. Please go to your pod.
translation.ja: カードの番号と同じ番号のポッドを探してください

translation.en: That will be your home for the duration of your stay here with us.
translation.ja: 施設内ではそこがあなた方の部屋です

translation.en: Leaving your pod at any unauthorized moment
translation.ja: 許可のない時間に外に出ると

translation.en: will result in the termination of your stay here at this trial,
translation.ja: 許可のない時間に外に出ると 被験者の資格を失い屈辱を味わうことになります

translation.en: as well as bringing shame and humiliation upon you.
translation.ja: 被験者の資格を失い屈辱を味わうことになります

translation.en: Once you reach your pod, an orderly will approach and begin to inspect your bag.
translation.ja: 用務員が各人のカバンの中を確認します

translation.en: Once the orderly has inspected your bag, you will put your bag in your locker.
translation.ja: 確認後はロッカーに入れてください

translation.en: Once you have done that, make your way to this gentleman.
translation.ja: 終わったらこちらへ

translation.en: He will give you your uniform, as well as your patented Neberdine shoes,
translation.ja: 施設内の服と靴をお渡しします

translation.en: which you cannot take with you at the end of the trial.
translation.ja: 終了後は必ず返却すること

translation.en: Once you have your uniforms and your shoes, you will make your way back to your pods,
translation.ja: 受け取ったらポッドに戻るように

translation.en: then you will get in your pods and change clothes in your pods.
translation.ja: 着替えはポッドの中で行い―

translation.en: There will be no changing in the commons.
translation.ja: 外で着替えないように

translation.en: Oh, my God!
translation.ja: 信じられない

translation.en: [orderly] Condoms are contraband. -Safety first. -[orderly] That's a red flag right there.
translation.ja: コンドームは持ち込み禁止です

translation.en: Intimacy in this facility is off-limits.
translation.ja: 施設内での交際も禁止

translation.en: There will be no cohabitation inside the pods.
translation.ja: １つの部屋を２人で使わないように

translation.en: Once the curfew starts, lights go out.
translation.ja: 門限になると消灯します

translation.en: You're not supposed to be here.
translation.ja: なぜここに？

translation.en: Please.
translation.ja: やめて

translation.en: What are my instructions? The pattern is the pattern.
translation.ja: 任務は何？これはパターンで―

translation.en: You're my contact. What are my instructions?
translation.ja: 君に接触しろと言われた

translation.en: [whispering] Please turn off the pattern. Please turn off...
translation.ja: パターンを止めてくれパターンを…

translation.en: -Owen. -[orderly] ..tight schedule.
translation.ja: オーウェン

translation.en: Your instructions are to go back to your pod and await my signal.
translation.ja: 部屋に戻って私の合図を待って

translation.en: I'm going to save the world.
translation.ja: 僕は救世主だ

translation.en: Yes. You're gonna save the world.
translation.ja: そうよ 世界を救うわ

translation.en: [orderly] ...and we will tell you when to sleep.
translation.ja: 世界を救うわ

translation.en: -But not if you blow our cover. -[orderly] ...expecting. Thank you.
translation.ja: でもバレたら終わり

translation.en: Okay, I understand.
translation.ja: 分かった

translation.en: [orderly] If you're having trouble getting into your pod,
translation.ja: 上の部屋に入る時には

translation.en: there is also a little ladder underneath that will help you get into your pod.
translation.ja: 下に小さなハシゴがあるのでそれを使うこと

translation.en: Also note, from here on in,
translation.ja: 施設内では番号で呼ばれます

translation.en: you will be referred to as the number on your lanyard.
translation.ja: 施設内では番号で呼ばれます あなた方は奇数組です

translation.en: You are the Odds.
translation.ja: あなた方は奇数組です

translation.en: Attention.
translation.ja: ご注目を

translation.en: Please give your attention to Dr. Muramoto and Dr. Fujita.
translation.ja: こちらはムラモト博士とフジタ医師

translation.en: They will be supervising your trials.
translation.ja: 試験の責任者です

translation.en: Welcome, subjects.
translation.ja: 歓迎しますよ

translation.en: You made the right choice.
translation.ja: 皆さんは正しい選択をした

translation.en: It's time to start your lives again.
translation.ja: 新たな人生の第一歩になるでしょう

translation.en: You don't fuck this up...
translation.ja: しくじるな

translation.en: I won't fuck this up.
translation.ja: 私はしくじらない

translation.en: Just kidding.
translation.ja: 冗談です
